main event: A pilot observed a small unidentified object while flying a T-33 jet trainer aircraft near Chanute AFB, Illinois, on 15 August 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as circular and approximately 3 feet in diameter.,It appeared to be metallic in color and motionless before accelerating and disappearing behind trees.,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 seconds.,The weather conditions were clear, with excellent visibility at the time of the sighting.,All four witnesses were in a state of shock after seeing the object.
